alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Decatur; Johnson; Rush; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 7:21PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Shelby, southwestern Rush, northern Decatur, east central Johnson and northeastern Bartholomew Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 721 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Rushville to near Shelbyville to near Franklin. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 81 and 92. Interstate 74 between mile markers 113 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for central Indiana.
